name: Dream Mirror Oneiromancy
text: Activate 1 of these effects./n● When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card while a "Dream Mirror of Joy" is in a Field Zone: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card./n● When your opponent would Special Summon monster(s) while a "Dream Mirror of Terror" is in a Field Zone: Negate that Summon, and if you do, destroy that monster./nYou can only activate 1 "Dream Mirror Oneiromancy" per turn.
